<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:merli.xtec.cat:merli/3251</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>MERLI</catalog>
            <entry>merli/3251</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="ca">La probabilitat, pot variar segons les circumstàncies?</string>
            <string language="en">Can probability depend on the circumstances?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kann Wahrscheinlichkeit von den Umständen 
abhängen?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La probabilité peut-elle dépendre des 
circonstances ?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Pode a probabilidade depender das 
circunstâncias?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Può la probabilità dipendere dalle circostanze?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μπορεί η πιθανότητα να εξαρτηθεί από τις περιστάσεις;</string>
          </title>
          <language>ca</language>
          <description>
            <string language="ca">Pregunta amb resposta (PAR) que tracta sobre com la probabilitat d'un esdeveniment d'un fenomen aleatori depèn de la informació que se'n té. Probabilitat condicionada. Conté un enllaç a una MUD des de la qual es pot veure un exemple.</string>
            <string language="en">Question and answer (PAR) on whether the probability of a random event occurring depends on the information available. Conditional probability. The unit includes a link to a MUD (mini teaching unit) where an example can be found.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">matemàtiques</string>
            <string language="en">mathematics</string>
            <string language="es">matemáticas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">probabilitat</string>
            <string language="en">probability</string>
            <string language="es">probabilidad</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">teoria de probabilitat</string>
            <string language="en">probability theory</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Fragen Sie und antworten Sie (GLEICHHEIT) an, ob die 
Wahrscheinlichkeit eines gelegentlichen Fallauftretens von den 
vorhandenen Informationen abhängt. Bedingte Wahrscheinlichkeit.
Die Maßeinheit schließt ein Link zu einem SCHLAMM ein 
(unterrichtende Minimaßeinheit) wo ein Beispiel gefunden werden kann.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Interrogez et répondez (PAIR) en fonction si la 
probabilité d'une occurrence aléatoire d'événement dépend de 
l'information disponible. Probabilité conditionnelle. 
L'unité inclut un lien à une BOUE (mini unité d'enseignement)
où un exemple peut être trouvé.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Questione e responda (PAR) sobre se a probabilidade de 
ocorrer aleatório do evento depende da informação disponível. 
Probabilidade condicional. A unidade inclui uma ligação 
a uma LAMA (unidade ensinando mini) onde um exemplo pode ser 
encontrado.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Domanda e risponda a (PAR) sopra se la probabilità di un 
avvenimento casuale di evento dipende dalle informazioni disponibili. 
Probabilità condizionale. L'unità include un 
collegamento ad un FANGO (mini unità d'istruzione) dove un esempio 
può essere trovato.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ερωταποκρίσεις (ΙΣΟΤΙΜΙΑ) εάν η πιθανότητα ενός 
τυχαίου γεγονότος που εμφανίζεται εξαρτάται από τις πληροφορίες 
διαθέσιμες. Υπό όρους πιθανότητα. Η μονάδα 
περιλαμβάνει μια σύνδεση με μια ΛΑΣΠΗ (μίνι μονάδα διδασκαλίας) 
όπου ένα παράδειγμα μπορεί να βρεθεί.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mathematik</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wahrscheinlichkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wahrscheinlichkeitstheorie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">mathématiques</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">probabilité</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">théorie des probabilités</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">matemática</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">probabilidade</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">teoria de probabilidade</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">matematica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">probabilità</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">teoria delle probabilità</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μαθηματικά</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">πιθανότητα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">θεωρία πιθανότητας</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
